title: Timucuan Ecological & Historic Preserve: Fort Caroline
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places     Fort Caroline                 Fort Caroline National Memorial      Fort Caroline memorializes the short-lived French presence in sixteenth century Florida. Here you will find stories of exploration, survival, religious disputes, territorial battles, and first contact between American Indians and Europeans.Visiting Fort CarolineHistory of Fort Caroline   Â      Visiting the Park           Remember the Failed French Colony Discover Our Story   Three hundred colonists left France to establish a permanent settlement in North America, we remember their stories here.           History Comes to Life Events   Check out our calendar to find out what events and programs we have coming up.           Miles of Trails Hiking   It is time to take a hike! Trails in the Timucuan Preserve take you through shady hammocks and along pristine beaches.
